main event: Witness observed a bright object in Richmond, California, with a color change from blue-white to brilliant orange over a duration of 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was sighted changing colors while moving in the sky., The witness described the brightness of the object compared to that of auto headlights., The object appeared to blend with the background at times., The witness noted a surprising speed and maneuverability of the object during the sighting., The object was observed by a confirmed witness and another person, the witness's mother.
sighted object: one bright light that changed from blue-white to brilliant orange
witness description: Lawrence Warren Doe, a 21-year-old male, with a background in radio and television repair.
